Name: Average time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to lead to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to be followed by 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time it takes 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to be done before 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to lead to a 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable' response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Elapsed time between 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the context of impacting the review process efficiency
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' Cycle Time in relation to overall manuscript processing time
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the end of the case
